name: RCZ - The Maze
description:
Here comes the latest 3D game, RCZ - The Maze. In the game you are trapped in a hospital which has paths like a maze. Horror sounds are coming from the maze. The second trailer which gives a better look of the game.

Support it on - Patreon - RCZ
